}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "<u>17</u>04262'''235'''-1.1 Rev1.0sp1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{see also|TP-LINK EAP225 v1.x|TP-LINK EAP245 v1.x|Proware}} Web GUI: http://tplinkeap.net
*Wireless: 2.4GHz: 450Mbps, 5GHz: 867Mbps (AC1350) *Internal Antennas: 2.4GHz: 3x 4dBi, 5GHz: 2x 5dBi *Ethernet Port: 1x 10/100/1000 (Gigabit) port (GbE) *Power Supply: 802.3af PoE/Passive PoE (24V/0.6A)
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== * [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33201-tp-link-eap225v3-ac1350-wireless-mu-mimo-gigabit-ceiling-mount-access-point-reviewed ''TP-Link EAP225v3 AC1350 Wireless MU-MIMO Gigabit Ceiling Mount Access Point Reviewed'' on '''SNB''']
